response_requirements.initial_response_description: Public body must respond within 15 business days by providing access, denying access, or advising additional time needed
response_requirements.final_response_notes: May extend 10 additional business days if voluminous material or requires legal review (total 25 business days max)
response_requirements.extension_notes: Must provide written notice within initial 15-day period stating reason for extension
response_requirements.deemed_denial: Failure to respond within applicable timeframe deemed denial

fee_structure.search_fee_notes: May charge reasonable fees for staff time and materials

exemptions.description: Trade secrets and commercial or financial information of privileged or confidential nature
Information of personal nature where disclosure would constitute unreasonable invasion of privacy
Information specifically exempted from disclosure by statute or common law

appeal_process.first_level: Court of Chancery or Superior Court
appeal_process.first_level_notes: No administrative appeal; direct court action
appeal_process.attorney_fees_notes: Court may award reasonable attorney fees and costs

requester_requirements.request_format_notes: Written request required; must use standard AG form via web portal
requester_requirements.specific_format: Written request to public body; web portal with standard form required

agency_obligations.web_portal_required: All state agencies and public bodies must develop web portal for FOIA requests
agency_obligations.standard_form_required: Must utilize standard request form promulgated by Attorney General
agency_obligations.liberal_construction: Shall be liberally construed to promote underlying purposes

oversight_body.name: Attorney General
oversight_body.role: Promulgates standard request form for web portals

validation_metadata.verification_notes: All fields manually verified from official Delaware statute. 15 business day response with 10 day extension possible (25 max). Deemed denial if no response. Web portal with AG standard form required. Residency requirement - Delaware citizens only. Liberal construction to promote openness. Court enforcement with attorney fees.
